name: fee_linkage_verification
description: Verifies management fees flow correctly between properties and management company

checks.name: Base Fee Consistency
checks.formula: Σ(Property Base Fee Expense) == Company Base Fee Revenue

checks.name: Incentive Fee Consistency
checks.formula: Σ(Property Incentive Fee Expense) == Company Incentive Fee Revenue

checks.name: Base Fee Calculation
checks.formula: Base Fee = Total Revenue × Base Fee Rate for each property

checks.name: Fee Rate Bounds
checks.formula: 0 <= Base Fee Rate <= 1 AND 0 <= Incentive Fee Rate <= 1
